page.title: 15A Typical Monday.
page.content: I usually get up at 7.00am and read until 7.30am thats when I hear my mums alarm.We usually get up around 8.00am. I have my breakfast of{Weetabix and {toast and tea}then I go upstairs to wash.I come down to dress I call for Craig and go to school.When we get to school we sometimes read and other days we have{assemblies.Assemblies}are where all the classes gather in one place to hear stories and hear and see other childrens work.Then we go back to class and we do some work like{ {maths}or{writing}or{English}then we go out to play.We work until lunch time.After lunch we have{Environmental {Studies,}a story and its time to go home.I change and go out to play with Craig and later have dinner,it is chips sausage and peas. I watch{TV {until 9.00pm.I go to bed and}listen{to {a tape.}
